snippet: After an eight-year hiatus to serve as California’s governor, an older Arnold Schwarzenegger is hoping to regain his status as a major film star.
abstract: Arnold Schwarzenegger, following an eight-year hiatus to serve as California's governor, is hoping to regain his status as a major film star; Schwarzenegger has a substantial, though not lead, role in the upcoming action film The Expendables 2.

byline.original: By MICHAEL CIEPLY and BROOKS BARNES

lead_paragraph: After an eight-year hiatus to serve as California’s governor, an older Arnold Schwarzenegger is hoping to regain his status as a major film star.

headline.seo: Arnold Schwarzenegger Gears Up for Act 2 as an Action Hero
headline.main: Schwarzenegger Gears Up for Act 2 as an Action Hero
headline.print_headline: Schwarzenegger Gears Up for Act 2 as an Action Hero
